name: INShortcutAvailabilityOptions
desc: Defined contexts in which an intent or activity might be relevant to a user.

items.name: static var sleepMindfulness: INShortcutAvailabilityOptions
items.desc: Meditation and other activities intended to facilitate mindfulness.

items.name: static var sleepJournaling: INShortcutAvailabilityOptions
items.desc: Writing and other daily logging activities.

items.name: static var sleepPodcasts: INShortcutAvailabilityOptions
items.desc: A podcast or other spoken audio.

items.name: static var sleepReading: INShortcutAvailabilityOptions
items.desc: A book or other reading material.

items.name: static var sleepWrapUpYourDay: INShortcutAvailabilityOptions
items.desc: An activity in preparation for sleep such as personal grooming or reviewing the next dayâ€™s agenda.

items.name: static var sleepYogaAndStretching: INShortcutAvailabilityOptions
items.desc: Physical activity to prepare for sleep.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Returns the set of availability categories represented by the given value.
